modules.name: Brand Mentions
insights: Brand is frequently referenced in AI-generated answers
Mentions are stronger for product-related queries
issues: Low visibility for non-branded informational queries
recommendations: Increase authoritative content around core topics

modules.name: Sentiment Analysis
insights: Overall sentiment is neutral to positive
Positive mentions are driven by product quality
issues: Limited emotional language in AI references
recommendations: Highlight use cases with measurable outcomes

modules.name: E-E-A-T & Trust
issues: Lack of strong first-party expert authorship

modules.name: Keyword Coverage
issues: Weak coverage for long-tail non-branded queries

modules.name: Competitor Analysis
insights: Competitors appear more frequently in AI answers
issues: Lower comparative visibility in AI search results

modules.name: Content Gaps
issues: Content does not fully address user intent
recommendations: Create content for missing high-intent topics

modules.name: AI Visibility Score
insights: Moderate visibility across AI search engines
issues: Lower visibility in Gemini and Perplexity
